attributes.action: Create a Penal battalion for all and any convicted of guncrime, gang related crime, drug dealing or seriously violent crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government should seriously look at the idea of a penal army batallion for all convicted of gun crimes or seriously violent criminals.

This would not be a choice for the guilty - it would be the way they have to be punished. 

They want to be violent and use weapons or guns, then let them do so at the front line of war zones throughout the world were we now send decent responsible soldiers.
